description.value:
You and an ally become a double threat

Benefit: Once per day after you and an ally strike the same target using the same type of weapon within the same round, automatically apply the critical hit effect of the second weapon to hit to the target and increase any associated save DCs by 2. If the ally who struck the target is your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.racial-features.tFj1fa4ZjZYEZZcQ]{bonded partner}, in addition to being subject to the critical hit effects, the target is @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{flat-footed} until the end of your next turn.
